original_text: And the priest shall bring them before the Lord, and shall offer his sin offering, and his burnt offering:
korean_text: 제사장은 그것들을 여호와 앞에 가져다가 속죄제와 번제를 드리고

sentences.original_text: And the priest shall bring them before the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 제사장은 그것들을 주님 앞으로 가져가고

sentences.original_text: and shall offer his sin offering
